title: Is it safe to wear a Fitbit while you sleep? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on how you define safe. It is possible that the wristband could get caught on your bedding or clothing, or you could put your wrist under the side of your face/head and cause a Fitbit indent to your skin. Other than incidental minor issues like these there are no ill effects.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Mohammed Saiful Alam Siddiquee

response.answer_text: It’s absolutely safe to wear your Fitbit to sleep. It actually has an app to monitor the quality of your sleep. So go ahead and and where it.
